Name: What is the most important feature to add to this tool?
Description: There are many different features that we could add to this tool, but we have limited resources to implement them. Which are the most important?

Name: Improving the Forum Discussion in Delphi
Description: We are working to make the Forum Discussion satisfy the needs of the user such that threading of comments have a better flow.
Criteria: Offer single solutions so they can be discussed and voted on.
